inlineContent.text: Add a frameworks folder into the project and add GCChat.framework into it.
Add this frameworks into the project as a dependency and select “Embed and sign”.
Install the following dependencies which are being used internally for realtime messaging and encryption.
Import the GCChat framework into the required files and the public functions can be used.

abstract.text: This article provides the list of steps that need to be followed to integrate the GCChat framework into an app.

GCChat is used as an instant chat messaging framework between two mobile devices. It acts as the interface between the client app and our backend to provide instant messaging in individual chats and group chats. All the messages are end to end encrypted to ensure the privacy of the users.
